h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mani Bead Location
content: The Mani Bead Curios can be found in The New West. It is randomly dropped from frozen corpses. So, you will just need to farm them until it drops from you. Mirrormere along Snowhill Path is a good spot to do this.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mani_Bead.md', within the main section titled 'Mani Bead', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mani Bead Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Mani Bead Curios can be found in The New West. It is randomly dropped from frozen corpses. So, you will just need to farm them until it drops from you. Mirrormere along Snowhill Path is a good spot to do this.
